Package net.royalur.rules.state

Class AbstractGameState<P extends Piece,S extends PlayerState,R extends Roll>

java.lang.Object
net.royalur.rules.state.AbstractGameState<P,S,R>
Type Parameters:
P - The type of pieces that are stored on the board in this game state.
S - The type of state that is stored for each player.
R - The type of rolls that may be stored in this game state.
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameState<P,S,R>
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractOngoingGameState, WinGameState
public abstract class AbstractGameState<P extends Piece,S extends PlayerState,R extends Roll> extends Object implements GameState<P,S,R>
A game state represents a single point within a game.
